sentences.en: Any narrative, any model, that could embody the fundamental organizing principles of human affairs can only be vague in its formative stages.
sentences.cn: 任何能体现人类事务中组织性的原则的叙述性，模范式的言语，在他的形成阶段都是模糊地。

sentences.en: Assignment is the core among the different ways of formative assessment.
sentences.cn: 在形成性考核的各种方式中,平时作业应该处于核心地位.

sentences.en: Constructive formative assessment, reflective writing assignments, assessment of the facilitator and faculty and students learning together were a few of them.
sentences.cn: 建设性的格式化评估，反映性写作分配，调解人评估和教员与学生一起学习是其中一部分。

sentences.en: Each of them has its own formative mechanism and geochemical features.
sentences.cn: 它们的形成机理和地质地化特征不同.

sentences.en: Formative approximation problem is solved by variable metric method for constrained optimization.
sentences.cn: 形成的近似问题使用优化方法库中的约束变尺度法来求解.

sentences.en: Formative evaluations are conducted in the service of design, during the design process.
sentences.cn: 进展式评估在设计阶段展开,服务于设计.

sentences.en: Her formative years were spent in Los Angeles.
sentences.cn: 她的成长阶段是在洛杉矶度过的.

sentences.en: In the formative years their alliance carried all before it.
sentences.cn: 在草创阶段，他们的联盟所向披靡。

sentences.en: Parents have the greatest formative effect on their children's behaviour.
sentences.cn: 父母对孩子的行为有最深远的影响.

sentences.en: Savagery was the formative period of the human race.
sentences.cn: 蒙昧阶段是人类的形成阶段.

sentences.en: She spent her formative years in east London.
sentences.cn: 她在伦敦东区度过其性格形成关键期。

sentences.en: She was born in Barbados but spent her formative years growing up in Miami.
sentences.cn: 她出生于巴巴多斯，但他的成长期是在迈阿密度过的。

sentences.en: She was born in Barbados but spent her formative years in east London.
sentences.cn: 她出生于巴巴多斯，但是其性格形成的关键期是在伦敦东区度过的。

sentences.en: The teachers are daily and hourly exercising an invisible , formative influence on the pupils'character.
sentences.cn: 教师们每日每时都在对学生的性格起着潜移默化的作用.

sentences.en: Their formative organs themselves are perfect in structure, as far as the microscope reveals.
sentences.cn: 它们的生殖器官本身, 在显微镜下看来,构造上仍然是完全的.

sentences.en: Viscoplasticity is still in a formative stage.
sentences.cn: 粘塑性仍然处在形成阶段.

sentences.en: With the advantage of network, formative evaluation can be effectively developed.
sentences.cn: 利用网络的优势, 可以有效地将作业的形成性评价功能发挥出来.

words.tran_cn: 模型，样板；起形成作用的人
使正式；使有效（formalize的过去分词）；使定形；拘泥于形式
使形式化；使正式；拘泥礼仪

phrases.tran_cn: 形成性评价；形成性测试；教学评测

trans.tran_cn: 形成的，造型的，[语]构词用的
trans.tran_en: having an important influence on the way someone or something develops
